#summary Tips on using the workflow console

= Introduction =

Console available at https://alfresco/alfresco/faces/jsp/admin/workflow-console.jsp

= Useful commands =

{{{
show workflows all
use workflow jbpm$14

show paths
desc path jbpm$14-@
show transitions
signal jbpm$14-@ OKAndAssignMeAsCuratorAndLiaison 
}}}
